thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: Louise Cole Franklin
thread.title_full: Goldmoney.com reviewed by Louise Cole Franklin

author: Louise Cole Franklin
title: Louise Cole Franklin
text: My son introduced me and my spouse to Goldmoney. I have to say, even for an "Old Fart" like me, it's easy to use. It's a great tool for saving in gold without keeping it at home. My only suggestion is that they start letting us save in gold for our RRSP / RRIF.
